TopicTitle: Alnand Kerman: A Short Story/Diary Entry/Data File

Articles.Content:
::/[-Name: Alnand Kerman

::/[-Status: MIA, presumed dead

::/[-Last time on KSC Grounds: First test flight of the Owl SSTS (Single Stage to Space)

::/[-Last Transmission: D30H3, sent from Owl SSTS, "I guess it's time"

::/[-Status of craft: Missing

Recovered Journal Entry

"The mission is a failure. It didn't even get to space, let alone the Jebble. KSC have sent me on this mission to get rid of me, I will get rid of their precious plane... Here I go.The airlock is open at 45KM, it is cold. I will take this Journal.

5 minutes until ground? Hah, if they want the SSTS, they better be quick. I want to survive. The map shows that if I jump, I will land in the ocean. My EVA pack has enough propellant to slow the descent, but by how much, that is the big question. Oh well. Now, to jump out of the airlock.

20 KM. I can feel the heat! It's so bracing! I better fire up the EVA Pack.

5 KM. Going slower.

1 KM. I don't think I will survive.

500 M. I'll never escape, even if I die.

100 M. This is it. Glory to --------

JOURNAL ENTRY OVER

Edited May 5, 2014 by Rainbowtrout
